ValidationRule.description: Cannot change opps with draft orders.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), NOT(ISCHANGED(Original_Renewal_Amount__c)), OR( ISCHANGED(Startdate_contract__c), ISCHANGED(End_date_contract__c), ISCHANGED(MRR__c), ISCHANGED(One_off__c)), NOT(OR( number_of_draft_Orders__c = 0, ISBLANK(number_of_draft_Orders__c))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunities with draft orders cannot be changed. Please delete the draft orders and recreate them once the opportunity changes have been made.
